text: Yarabahaye intahe y’ukuri y’idini nkakurya nyene yasigiye iragi intumwa y’Imana Nuhu (iii) hamwe nivyo twayugururiye, hamwe nivyo twaragiye intumwa y’Imana Ibrahimu (iii) hamwe n’intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii)hamwe n’intumwa y’Imana Issa mwene Mariyamu (iii) yuko bohagarika idini ry’Imana, kandi ntimuze mucanemwo kuri ivyo kuko bizobagora kubegeranya kuvyo uba hamagarira, rero Imana niyo yitorera uwo yishakiye nukumu rongora uwayitu mbereye
